alert.note: Alert for Molokai Leeward South; Molokai North; Molokai Southeast; Molokai West; Molokai Windward (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 16 at 3:28AM HST until April 17 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FOR MOLOKAI LANAI MAUI KAHOOLAWE AND THE BIG ISLAND... ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Molokai, Lanai, Maui, Kahoolawe and the Big Island. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Flood prone roads and other low lying areas may be closed due to elevated runoff and overflowing streams. Urban areas may receive more significant flooding and property damage due to rapid runoff. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A passing upper-level disturbance will support heavy showers and thunderstorms that could lead to flash flooding through tonight. The highest flood risk will be across windward slopes, though heavy rainfall and thunderstorms could occur anywhere.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Molokai Leeward South; Molokai North; Molokai Southeast; Molokai West; Molokai Windward
